metadata.Title: CVE-2023-2829 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: A `named` instance configured to run as a DNSSEC-validating recursive resolver with the Aggressive Use of DNSSEC-Validated Cache (RFC 8198) option (`synth-from-dnssec`) enabled can be remotely terminated using a zone with a malformed NSEC record. This issue affects BIND 9 versions 9.16.8-S1 through 9.16.41-S1 and 9.18.11-S1 through 9.18.15-S1.

notes.Note: alexmurray> As of isc-dhcp-4.4.3-1, isc-dhcp vendors bind9 libs mdeslaur> This CVE only affects Bind Suported Preview Version, which is not in Ubuntu

criterions.comment: bind9: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
